1994 di nakamurata japanaye thokushima wishwa widyalayen injineru aacharya upadhiya himi wuna. 1999 di nakamura nichiya aayathanaya atha hara amerikawe santa babarahi pihiti kafoniya wshwa widyalaye injineru widya mahacharyawaraya lesa wada bara gaththa.
